segments.text: I watch the woman now, her focus unwavering on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Does she not hear the water gushing over the sink’s edge?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It astounds me how someone can be so enveloped in their task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children move like shadows around her, stealing glances while she’s oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s an innocence to their actions that warms my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that feeling quickly shifts as I recall the risks they’re taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and it could all end in disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
